title: jaya jaya shuddha shakti
sahitya:
jaya jaya shuddha shakti Om enrE dhyAnam sheivOm jnAnam peruga


anupallavi

  bhayam piNi tuyar paTTenrozhiyum paramAnanda amudam pozhiyum


caraNam 1    tannalattinait-turappOm bhuvit-tAi nalam sheyya uyirppOm
innalvarinum punnakaiyuDan eDutta vinaiyai muDittu magizhvOm
    caraNam 2    vETrumaigaLai ozhippOm Atma vIrarAgat-tazhaippOm
mATruyarnda vigjnAna shuDaril manadai vATTi punitarAvOm
